options.option-description: The standalone search bar must only appear as part of the header pattern.

• The search banner may be used on the body section of a webpage.
  • The search banner must not be used directly below the navigation bar pattern.
  • It is recommended that the search banner appears directly above the footer pattern if included on the main body of a webpage.

• The search banner with tag buttons option must only pull results from the child pages.
